name: Remove Blue Bits
description: Removes annoying blue bits that get in the way of otherwise good stylish themes for tumblr. Does your favorite theme miss a few spots? Did a tumblr update splash some drab blues all over a theme that used to be great? This style will get rid of those bits for you.
additional_info:
Note: As this style changes the color of several elements, it may interfere with a few of your theme's colors at first. To fix: Enable this style. Disable your theme. Enable your theme again. 

If it works for you, please leave a positive rating.

Moved the old Remove Blue Bits here: style 106825
